name: Collado Engineering
description: Collado Engineering is an engineering firm based in White Plains New York. I redesigned and developed their website from the ground up moving their basic .html site to WordPress

name: Mario's Restaurant
description: An Italian restaurant on Arthur Avenue in the Bronx. I was hired to redesign the existing website. I designed and developed a custom Wordpress site for customers to book reservations, view the menu, and browse photos.

name: Ashrae Bi-State Chapter
description: The local chapter of ASHRAE (American Society of Heating and Air-Conditioning Engineers) in New York. I designed and developed the site using Drupal to create custom pages and views for the members to add events, upload photos and newsletters

name: Balticare
description:
Balticare Inc. provides evaporative cooling equipment to the NYC area. The main purpose of the website was to inform users on their products and capture leads on potential customers.
I developed this website using a custom Drupal theme I built from scratch and utilizing the Views module to create customized blocks and product pages.

name: Steve L. Photography
description: Dedicated to my friend, Stephen LePorisz, who took up photography as a hobby. I set up this website in memory of him to share some of his best photos.

name: Zeppieri Motor Sports
description: Joe Zeppieri is a freelance mechanic that specializes in custom BMW maintenance, parts, restoration and detailing. For this project I designed the site and marketing materials including his logo, business cards, flyers and even t-shirts. This is my 3rd redesign to the website since originally creating it in 2010.

name: Nu-Garde
description: Originally starting out as an art gallery for emerging artists to sell their artwork, the site was changed over to a list museum tour guides and lectures. Now customers can book guided tours of NYC's art galleries, museums, and auction houses.

name: Full Moon Pizza
description: A corner pizzeria restaurant on Arthur Avenue in the Bronx. I helped design and develop a custom mobile WordPress website for their customers to view photos and read their menu.

name: Mike Tropea
description: This is my personal portfolio site, crafted with Astro, Vue, and TypeScript to highlight my work in web development. It features a selection of recent projects, showcases my technical skills and experience, and offers an inside look at my approach to building modern, performant websites.
